articles.description: While the new documentary Pele goes into detail never previously discussed by the 80-year-old in front of camera before, it is his physical condition that is perhaps the most telling story of all.
articles.content:
Brazil legend Pele cuts a frail figure in the new Netflix documentary focusing on his extraordinary career.
Released on Tuesday, the film Pele, codirected by David Tryhorn and Ben Nicholas, involves… [+2832 chars]
